projects.title: AutoDescribe
projects.description: RAG + human-in-the-loop product description generator that automates content creation while maintaining quality control.
projects.problemStatement: E-commerce platforms struggle with creating consistent, high-quality product descriptions at scale, leading to poor user experience and reduced conversion rates.
projects.solutionApproach: Developed an AI-powered system combining Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with human-in-the-loop validation to generate contextually relevant product descriptions while ensuring quality and brand consistency.
projects.impact: Transformed content creation workflow for multiple e-commerce clients, enabling scalable product catalog management.
projects.useCase: E-commerce platforms with large product catalogs need to generate consistent, high-quality product descriptions at scale. AutoDescribe enables content teams to maintain brand voice while dramatically reducing manual effort through AI-powered generation with human oversight.

performanceMetrics.description: Reduction in time required to create product descriptions
Improvement in description consistency across product catalog
Increase in product page conversion rates
